IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: BETHANY HILL PLACE, A LIVING AND LEARNING COMMUNITY OF METROWEST NEIGHBORS, SPONSORED BY THE SISTERS OF ST. JOSEPH OF BOSTON, PROVIDES HOUSING WITH EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR THOSE IN NEED WITHIN A CLIMATE OF RESPECT, INCLUSION, AND ACCEPTANCE. RESIDENTS ARE EMPOWERED TO ENGAGE IN, AND FULLY TRANSFORM THEIR LIVES IN A SAFE, SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: BETHANY HILL PLACE, A LIVING AND LEARNING COMMUNITY OF METROWEST NEIGHBORS, SPONSORED BY THE SISTERS OF ST. JOSEPH OF BOSTON, PROVIDES HOUSING WITH EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR THOSE IN NEED WITHIN A CLIMATE OF RESPECT, INCLUSION, AND ACCEPTANCE. RESIDENTS ARE EMPOWERED TO ENGAGE IN, AND FULLY TRANSFORM THEIR LIVES IN A SAFE, SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENT.
IRS990.Desc: RENTED EDUCATIONAL AND SUPPORTIVE HOUSING UNITS - SERVING OVER 102 PEOPLE EACH YEAR. DURING 2021 SEVERAL ONSITE PROGRAMS AND EVENTS WERE CANCELED DUE TO THE COVID19 PANDEMIC. IN ADDITION THERE WERE SUBSEQUENT SHUT DOWNS OF COMMUNITY ROOMS AND STAFF OFFICES. HOWEVER, EDUCATIONAL COUNSELING AND SUPPORT CONTINUED VIRTUALLY VIA, EMAIL, PHONE AND ZOOM VIDEO CONFERENCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE "CODE"). THE ORGANIZATION, HOWEVER, IS SUBJECT TO THE TAX ON UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME, IF ANY SUCH INCOME EXISTS. THE ORGANIZATION HAD UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME OF APPROXIMATELY $33,600 DURING BOTH THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021. THE ORGANIZATION RECOGNIZES AND MEASURES ITS UNRECOGNIZED TAX POSITIONS AND ASSESSES THE LIKELIHOOD, BASED ON THEIR TECHNICAL MERIT, THAT TAX POSITIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BASED ON THE FACTS, CIRCUMSTANCES AND INFORMATION AVAILABLE AT THE END OF EACH PERIOD. THE MEASUREMENT OF UNRECOGNIZED TAX POSITIONS IS ADJUSTED WHEN NEW INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE, OR WHEN AN EVENT OCCURS THAT REQUIRES A CHANGE. INTEREST AND PENALTIES ASSOCIATED WITH UNRECOGNIZED TAX POSITIONS, IF ANY, WOULD BE CLASSIFIED AS INTEREST EXPENSE AND ADDITIONAL INCOME TAXES, RESPECTIVELY, IN THE STATEMENTS OF ACTIVITIES AND CHANGES IN NET ASSETS. THE ORGANIZATION DID NOT IDENTIFY ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021. THE ORGANIZATION IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY PERIODS PENDING OR IN PROGRESS.
SPECIAL EVENTS DIRECT EXPENSES 7,977. IN-KIND DONATIONS 24,260.
SPECIAL EVENTS DIRECT EXPENSES 7,977. IN-KIND DONATIONS 24,260.
BETHANY HILL PLACE RECEIVES RESTRICTED CONTRIBUTIONS DESIGNATED FOR STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS AND THE AMOUNT IS RELEASED FROM RESTRICTION ONCE THE SCHOLARSHIP IS AWARDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BETHANY HILL PLACE USES A PROPERTY MANAGEMENT COMPANY TO MANAGE THE BETHANY HILL PROPERTY AND THE SISTERS OF ST. JOSEPH PERFORM ACCOUNTING DUTIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ANNUAL BUDGET AND APPOINTMENT OF NEW BOARD MEMBERS IS SUBJECT TO APPROVAL BY THE CORPORATION FOR SPONSORED MINISTRIES OF THE CONGREGATION OF THE SISTERS OF SAINT JOSEPH OF BOSTON.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS PROVIDED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY BEFORE IT WAS FILED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION INFORMALLY MONITORS THE POLICY THROUGHOUT THE YEAR AND RE-AFFIRMS THE POLICY ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DETERMINATION OF COMPENSATION OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR THROUGH BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEW AND APPROVAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: CONGREGATION OF THE SISTERS OF ST JOSEPH
